name: IDECIDED
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
400 trillion to 1, the odds of becoming a human being. 
You already won the impossible gift of becoming a human being on earth, now it's time to DECIDE how you want to live the one life you've been given. There are way too many people out here living like we get to do this life thing twice. 

Inspiring you to take control of your life through radical accountability. 

Listen to Connor Miller the CO-Founder of ArdentX a 50-million-dollar logistics company, and the I DECIDED movement talk about the conscious decisions we make in our lives to manifest the things we want to accomplish. Hustle, Self-Awareness, Perspective, Gratitude, Patience, Service, Overcoming Drug Addiction, the transition from collegiate level athlete into "real life", Self-Love, Self-Discipline, and much more of the Decisions we must make in order to achieve our dreams. 

Due to the nature of the I DECIDED movement's content, this Flash Briefing skill may contain profanity. That said, if you're not listening because of that, it's best that you ask yourself this question: "Am I discounting the actual context of what’s being said simply due to the way it’s delivered?" 

If so, you're literally stopping at floor one instead of actually getting on the elevator ;)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
